reviews.title: Toxic workplace
reviews.pros: Working with some of the smartest people in the tech business. Fast paced environment and delivering results. Great offices, equipment and comp package.
reviews.cons: US centric. Toxic culture and emotional bullying (during COVID / recovery in some departments), high pressure (a pro for some), some unsociable working hours to keep in the loop and participate in east / west US coast meetings.
reviews.advice: Develop more empathetic and genuine people managers / senior leaders who can better manage and help grow high performing team members.

reviews.title: Opportunities to progress if you put in the work
reviews.pros: I worked at Tripadvisor for 8 years- in that time I saw a ton of development, mentorship & support to help me progress in my career. The people culture is great with most being great fun & willing to pitch in and pull together. My experience was that you have the opportunity to progress upwards or in to other roles, if you are proactive in reaching out across the business to learn more. The company focus on inclusion is really strong, some leaders dedicating real time to drive this across the culture of the business
reviews.cons: The company can try to move fast for it's size- this can cause a breakdown in communications with a matrixed organisation and parallel teams. You have to be able to work around this and pivot quickly. In the last couple of years I felt there was some ambiguity around the business value prop/overall mission- making it less engaging for everyone without clear sight of what was trying to be achieved. European & APAC based employees would often have to flex to adjust to American employee working hours- meant late nights most weeks
reviews.advice: With a new CEO and several members of the leadership team, steer the ship to a clear view of the destination to give everyone a solid understanding of what they are striving to be. Potentially review some of the exisitng company cultures- perhaps Speed wins is not the best core value anymore.
